summary: The Abortion Funding Awareness Act of 2025 mandates that states report information to the Secretary of Health and Human Services on Medicaid payments made to abortion providers. These reports must include payment amounts, purposes, comparisons to prior years, abortion numbers, gestational ages, and methods. The Secretary is required to submit a comprehensive report to Congress and publish it online. The bill also defines key terms like "abortion provider" and "Medicaid payment from Federal funds" and makes conforming amendments to the Social Security Act.
